```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
# load libraries
if(!require(EBImage)){
  source("http://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R")
  biocLite("EBImage")
}
if(!require(OpenImageR)){
  install.packages("OpenImageR")
}

```

```{r }
library(EBImage)
library(OpenImageR)
library(dplyr)
library(pbapply)

img_dir <- "../data/train/"
num_files <- length(list.files(img_dir))
dir_names <- list.files(img_dir)
files <- mixedsort(sort(dir_names))

# Use Matrix M to store the HOG features
M <- matrix(NA, num_files,length(h1)) 

for(i in 1:num_files){
  img <- readImage(paste0(img_dir, files[i]))
  M[i,] <- HOG(img,cells = 3, orientations = 6)
}

# output the features
write.csv(M, file = "../output/hog_features.csv",row.names = F)
```
